oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 1st Annual Mountain Springs Camping Resort (with edits) (16287)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: festivals; Bluegrass music; Flatt, Lester; Country Gentlemen (Musical group); Nashville Grass (Musical group); Cooper, Stoney, 1918-1977; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011; McCoury, Del, 1939-;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the 1st Annual Mountain Springs Bluegrass Festival with Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass, Country Gentlemen, Wilma Lee and Stoney Cooper, Charlie Moore and Dixie Partners, the Shenandoah Cut - ups, Del McCoury and others at the Mountain Springs Camping Resort on September 6, 7, and 8. Poster includes handwritten edits. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/31893.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: half-sheet posters; posters; proofs (prints by function);
